summary.span: 使用可扩展样式表转换语言 (XSLT) 转换 XML 数据。

span.span: Transforms XML data using an Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations (XSLT) style sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 Microsoft .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须使用命名空间`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must use the namespace `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 还可以使用类将其他参数添加到样式表中。Additional arguments can also be added to the style sheet using the class. 此类包含可从样式表中调用的样式表和扩展对象的输入参数。This class contains input parameters for the style sheet and extension objects which can be called from the style sheet. 转换 XML 数据:To transform XML data: 1. 创建对象。Create an object. 2. 使用方法加载转换的样式表。Use the method to load the style sheet for the transformation. 此方法具有多个重载, 并且可以使用、 、 或 URL 与文件位置一起加载样式表。This method has several overloads and can load a style sheet using an , , , or a URL with the location of the file. 3. 使用方法来转换 XML 数据。Use the method to transform the XML data. 此方法具有多个重载, 并且可以处理不同类型的输入和输出。This method has several overloads and can handle different types of input and output. 你还可以指定 , 其中包含要在转换过程中用作输入的其他参数。You can also specify an containing additional arguments to use as input during the transformation. **安全注意事项****Security Considerations** 在创建使用 类的应用程序时，应了解下列项及其含义：When creating an application that uses the class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - 默认情况下启用扩展对象。Extension objects are enabled by default. 如果包含扩展对象的 对象传递给 方法，将利用这些扩展对象。If an object containing extension objects is passed to the method, they are utilized. - XSLT 样式表可以包括对其他文件的引用以及嵌入式脚本块。XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks. 恶意用户可以通过向您提供数据或样式表来利用此方法, 在执行该操作时, 将导致系统在计算机资源不足的情况下进行处理。A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed will cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources. - 在混合信任环境下运行的 XSLT 应用程序可能会引发样式表欺骗。XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing. 例如，恶意用户可能会为对象加载有害的样式表，并将其交给另一个用户，而后者会继续调用 方法并执行转换。For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the method and executes the transformation. 不接受来自不受信任源的对象、XSLT 样式表或 XML 源数据可以减轻这些安全问题。These security issues can be mitigated by not accepting objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from untrusted sources. **脚本支持****Scripting Support** 此类使用`msxsl:script`元素支持嵌入的脚本。This class supports embedded scripting using the `msxsl:script` element. 在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 中, 样式表的证据确定授予嵌入脚本的权限。In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the evidence of the style sheet determines what permissions are given to embedded scripts. - 如果样式表是从统一资源标识符 (URI) 加载的, 则使用 URI 创建证据。If the style sheet was loaded from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI), the URI is used to create the evidence. 此证据包含 URI 及其站点和区域。This evidence includes the URI along with its site and zone. - 如果使用其他源加载了样式表, 则可以通过将对象传递给方法来提供证据。If the style sheet was loaded using another source, you can provide evidence by passing a object to the method. 否则, 脚本程序集会完全信任。Otherwise, the script assembly has full trust. 不完全受信任的`UnmanagedCode`调用方: 编译嵌入式脚本需要权限。Semi-trusted callers: `UnmanagedCode` permission is required to compile the embedded script. `ControlEvidence`需要提供对方法的权限。`ControlEvidence` permission is required to provide to the method. 如果调用方不具有所需的权限, 则会引发。A is thrown if the caller does not have the necessary permissions. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. `msxsl:script`元素具有以下要求:The `msxsl:script` element has the following requirements: - `msxsl:script`元素属于`urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`命名空间。The `msxsl:script` element belongs to the `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` namespace. 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`。The style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`. - 元素可以包含指定要使用的脚本语言的特性。`language` `msxsl:script`The `msxsl:script` element can include a `language` attribute that specifies the scripting language to use. `language`特性的值必须是下列值之一:C#、CSharp、VB、/或 JavaScript。The value of the `language` attribute must be one of the following: C#, CSharp, VB, VisualBasic, JScript, or JavaScript. 由于语言名称不区分大小写, 因此 JavaScript 和 javascript 都是有效的。Because the language name is not case-sensitive, JavaScript and javascript are both valid. 如果未指定属性, 则默认为 JScript。 `language`If a `language` attribute is not specified, it defaults to JScript. - 元素必须包括一个`implements-prefix`属性, 该属性包含表示与脚本块关联的命名空间的前缀。 `msxsl:script`The `msxsl:script` element must include an `implements-prefix` attribute that contains the prefix representing the namespace associated with the script block. 此命名空间必须在样式表中定义。This namespace must be defined within the style sheet. 样式表可以包含多个按命名空间分组的脚本块。A style sheet can include multiple script blocks which are grouped by namespace. 同一命名空间中不能有多个语言的脚本块。You cannot have script blocks with multiple languages within the same namespace. 脚本块可以调用另一个脚本块中定义的函数, 前提是脚本块驻留在同一命名空间中。Script blocks can call a function defined in another script block, provided the script blocks reside within the same namespace. 脚本块的内容根据脚本语言 (由`language`特性提供) 的规则和语法进行分析。The contents of a script block are parsed according to the rules and syntax of the scripting language (supplied by the `language` attribute). 例如, 如果您有一个C#脚本块, 注释将以`//`字符为前缀。For example, if you had a C# script block, comments would be prefixed by the `//` characters. 注释必须为有效的 XML 内容。The comments must be valid XML content. > [!NOTE] > 建议你将脚本块包装在 CDATA 节中。It is recommended that you wrap script blocks in a CDATA section. [!INCLUDE [xsltransform-script](~/includes/xsltransform-script.md)] 函数可以在 `msxsl:script` 元素内声明。Functions can be declared within the `msxsl:script` element. 下表显示了默认情况下支持的命名空间。The following table shows the namespaces that are supported by default. |支持的命名空间Supported Namespaces|说明Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`System`|系统类。System classes.| |`System.Collection`|集合类。Collection classes.| |`System.Text`|文本处理类。Text handling classes.| |`System.Xml`|核心 XML 类。Core XML classes.| |`System.Xml.Xsl`|XSLT 类。XSLT classes.| |`System.Xml.XPath`|XML 路径语言 (XPath) 类。XML Path Language (XPath) classes.| 脚本函数定义的所提供的参数和返回值必须是下列万维网联合会 (W3C) 类型之一。The supplied arguments and return values defined by the script functions must be one of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) types listed below. 下表详细说明了 W3C 类型 (XPath 或 XSLT) 与相应 .NET Framework 类之间的映射。The following table details the mapping between the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding .NET Framework classes. |W3C 类型W3C Type|等效的 .NET 类Equivalent .NET class| |--------------|---------------------------| |String (XPath)String (XPath)|`System.String`| |布尔 (XPath)Boolean (XPath)|`System.Boolean`| |Number (XPath)Number (XPath)|`System.Double`| |结果树片段 (XSLT)Result Tree Fragment (XSLT)|`System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator`| |节点集 (XPath)Node Set (XPath)|`System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator`| 如果脚本函数使用下列数值类型之一：Int16、UInt16、Int32、UInt32、Int64、UInt64、Single 或 Decimal, 这些类型被强制转换为双精度值, 这两种类型映射到 W3C XPath 类型的数字。If the script function utilizes one of the following numeric types: Int16, UInt16, Int32, UInt32, Int64, UInt64, Single, or Decimal, these types are coerced to Double, which maps to the W3C XPath type number. 如果调用的函数无法将参数结果转换为所需的类型之一, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown when a function is called that cannot convert the argument result to one of the required types. > [!NOTE] > `msxsl:script`和`msxsl:node-list` `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`是类支持的唯一命名空间中的函数。`msxsl:script` and `msxsl:node-list` are the only functions from the `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` namespace that are supported by the class. 能够利用公共语言运行时 (CLR) 代码作为扩展机制。 has the ability to utilize common language runtime (CLR) code as an extension mechanism. 这是通过将类的实例传递给类并在 XSLT 样式表中调用其公共方法来完成的。This is accomplished by passing an instance of a class to the class and calling its public methods within an XSLT style sheet. 使用`params`关键字定义的方法允许传递指定数目的参数, 在这种情况下不能正常工作。Methods that are defined with the `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, do not work correctly in this scenario. 有关更多详细信息, 请参阅[params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md) 。See [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md) for more details. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[具有 XslTransform 类的 XSLT 转换](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-transformations-with-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information see [XSLT Transformations with the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-transformations-with-the-xsltransform-class.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将转换指定的 XML 文档, 并将结果输出到控制台。The following example transforms the specified XML document and outputs the result to the console. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XslTransform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XslTransform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表, 其中包括和`xsl:include` `xsl:import`元素中引用的所有样式表。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用没有用户凭据的来解析外部资源。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果样式表位于要求身份验证的网络资源上, 则使用重载, 该重载采用作为其参数之一的重载, 并使用所需的凭据指定。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 如果样式表包含嵌入式脚本, 则该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 样式表的 URI 用于创建将应用于程序集的证据。The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方`UnmanagedCode`没有权限, 则不编译嵌入的脚本并引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例将 XML 文档转换为 HTML 文档。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 它显示表中每本书的 ISBN、标题和价格。It displays the ISBN, title, and price for each book in a table. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例使用下列两个输入文件。The sample uses the following two input files. `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表, 其中包括和`xsl:include` `xsl:import`元素中引用的所有样式表。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用没有用户凭据的来解析外部资源。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果样式表位于要求身份验证的网络资源上, 则使用重载, 该重载采用作为其参数之一的重载, 并使用所需的凭据指定。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 样式表从的当前节点加载到其所有子级。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 这使您可以使用文档的一部分作为样式表。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 此方法返回后 , 将定位到样式表末尾后的下一个节点。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果已到达文档结尾， 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果样式表包含实体, 则应指定可解析实体 (返回`true`) 的。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在这种情况下 , 可以使用。In this case, an can be used. 如果样式表包含嵌入式脚本, 则该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 程序集具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建议的做法是使用方法提供证据。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方`UnmanagedCode`没有权限, 则不编译嵌入的脚本并引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例将转换按标题对所有书籍进行排序的 XML 文件。The following example transforms an XML file sorting all the books by title. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/CPP/trans3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/CS/trans3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/VB/trans3.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下数据文件作为输入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load3#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/XML/books.xml#2)] `titles.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load3#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/XML/titles.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表, 其中包括和`xsl:include` `xsl:import`元素中引用的所有样式表。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用没有用户凭据的来解析外部资源。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果样式表位于要求身份验证的网络资源上, 则使用重载, 该重载采用作为其参数之一的重载, 并使用所需的凭据指定。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 如果样式表包含嵌入式脚本, 则该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 程序集具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建议的做法是使用方法提供证据。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方`UnmanagedCode`没有权限, 则不编译嵌入的脚本并引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 如果样式表包含嵌入式脚本, 则该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 样式表的 URI 用于创建将应用于程序集的证据。The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方`UnmanagedCode`没有权限, 则不编译嵌入的脚本并引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例将 XML 文档转换为 HTML 文档。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 该示例将加载一个包含`xsl:include`引用另一个样式表的元素的 XSLT 样式表。The example loads an XSLT style sheet which contains an `xsl:include` element referencing another style sheet. 传递给方法, 该方法用于设置为所包含的样式表访问网络资源所需的凭据。An is passed to the method which sets the credentials necessary to access the network resource for the included style sheet. [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/CS/trans2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/VB/trans2.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下数据文件作为输入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load2#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/XML/books.xml#2)] `sort.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load2#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/XML/sort.xsl#3)] `includefile.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load2#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load2/XML/includefile.xsl#4)]

XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表, 其中包括和`xsl:include` `xsl:import`元素中引用的所有样式表。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 样式表从的当前节点加载到其所有子级。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 这使您可以使用文档的一部分作为样式表。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 此方法返回后 , 将定位到样式表末尾后的下一个节点。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果已到达文档结尾， 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果样式表包含实体, 则应指定可解析实体 (返回`true`) 的。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在这种情况下 , 可以使用。In this case, an can be used. 如果样式表包含嵌入式脚本, 则该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 程序集具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建议的做法是使用方法提供证据。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方`UnmanagedCode`没有权限, 则不编译嵌入的脚本并引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information.

## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表, 其中包括和`xsl:include` `xsl:import`元素中引用的所有样式表。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 样式表从的当前节点加载到其所有子级。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 这使您可以使用文档的一部分作为样式表。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 此方法返回后 , 将定位到样式表末尾后的下一个节点。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果已到达文档结尾， 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果样式表包含实体, 则应指定可解析实体 (返回`true`) 的。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在这种情况下 , 可以使用。In this case, an can be used. 提供证据的方法有多种。There are different ways to provide evidence. 下表描述了为常见用户方案提供的证据类型。The following table describes what type of evidence to provide for common user scenarios. |方案Scenario|要提供的证据类型Type of evidence to provide| |--------------|---------------------------------| |XSLT 样式表是自包含的, 或来自你信任的代码库。The XSLT style sheet is self-contained or comes from a code base that you trust.|使用程序集中的证据。Use the evidence from your assembly.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
xslt.Load(xslReader, resolver, this.GetType().Assembly.Evidence);
| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源已知, 并且存在可验证的 URL。The origin of the source is known, and there is a verifiable URL.|使用 URL 创建证据。Create evidence using the URL.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform();
 Evidence evidence = XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl(stylesheetURL); 
xslt.Load(xslReader,resolver,evidence);
| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源未知。The origin of the source is not known.|将 evidence 设置为 `null`。Set evidence to `null`. 脚本块将不进行处理，不支持 XSLT `document()` 函数，而且不允许特权扩展对象。Script blocks are not processed, the XSLT `document()` function is not supported, and privileged extension objects are disallowed.

此外, 还可以将`resolver`参数设置为。 `null`Additionally, you can also set the `resolver` parameter to `null`. 这可确保`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`元素不被处理。This ensures that `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements are not processed.| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源未知，但您需要脚本支持。The origin of the source is not known, but you require script support.|从调用方请求证据。Request evidence from the caller. 调用方的 API 必须提供一种方法来提供证据, 通常为类。The API of the caller must provide a way to provide evidence, typically the class.| ## Examples 下面的示例执行 XSLT 转换, 其中`xsltReader` 是包含样式表, `secureURL`是可用于创建的受信任 URL。The following example performs an XSLT transformation where `xsltReader` is an containing a style sheet and `secureURL` is a trusted URL that can be used to create . 方法用于创建应用于样式表的。 The method is used to create which is applied to the style sheet. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Load4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load4/CPP/trans_ev.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load4/CS/trans_ev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load4/VB/trans_ev.vb#1)]

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
xslt.Load(xslNav, resolver, this.GetType().Assembly.Evidence);
| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源已知, 并且存在可验证的 URL。The origin of the source is known, and there is a verifiable URL.|使用 URL 创建证据。Create evidence using the URL.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
Evidence evidence = XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl(style sheetURL); 
xslt.Load(xslNav,resolver,evidence);

此外, 还可以将`resolver`参数设置为。 `null`Additionally, you can also set the `resolver` parameter to `null`. 这可确保`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`元素不被处理。This ensures that `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements are not processed.| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源未知，但您需要脚本支持。The origin of the source is not known, but you require script support.|从调用方请求证据。Request evidence from the caller. 调用方的 API 必须提供一种方法来提供证据, 通常`Evidence`为类。The API of the caller must provide a way to provide evidence, typically the `Evidence` class.| ## Examples 下面的示例使用外部源中的样式表执行 XSLT 转换。The following example performs an XSLT transformation using a style sheet from an outside source. 由于样式表来自不受信任的源, `resolver`因此和`evidence`参数设置为。 `null`Because the style sheet comes from an untrusted source, the `resolver` and `evidence` parameters are set to `null`. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法现已过时。This method is now obsolete. 属性的设置确定如何解析 XSLT `document()`函数。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法, 该方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 当输出到 (忽略元素) 时, 不支持元素。`xsl:output` `xsl:output`The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (the `xsl:output` element is ignored). 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 此方法使您可以执行源文档的异步转换。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段, 必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的, 并将其传递给方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 下面的示例对节点片段执行转换。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` 该示例使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`文件作为输入, 并将以下结果输出到控制台。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ```

XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选项将应用于整个文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换言之, 如果当前节点是在文档根节点以外的节点树上设置的, 则不会阻止转换进程访问已加载文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后, 将保持其原始状态。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着, 在调用方法后, 节点 (在转换进程之前是当前节点) 将保留当前节点。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 由于提供只读输出`xsl:output` , 因此忽略元素。Because provides read-only output, the `xsl:output` element is ignored. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 此方法使您可以执行源文档的异步转换。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. > [!NOTE] > 此方法已过时。This method is obsolete. 属性的设置确定如何解析 XSLT document () 函数。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT document() function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法, 该方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 当输出到 (忽略元素) 时, 不支持元素。`xsl:output` `xsl:output`The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (the `xsl:output` element is ignored). 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 此方法使您可以执行源文档的异步转换。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段, 必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的, 并将其传递给方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment, and pass that to the method. 下面的示例对节点片段执行转换。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 该示例使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`文件作为输入, 并将以下结果输出到控制台。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例将转换 XML 文档, 并将结果输出到`XmlReader`。The following example transforms an XML document and outputs the results to an `XmlReader`. 使用必要凭据处理任何 XSLT `document()`函数的。An with the necessary credentials is used to process any XSLT `document()` functions. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/CPP/trans_snip3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/CS/trans_snip3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/VB/trans_snip3.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选项将应用于整个文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换言之, 如果当前节点是在文档根节点以外的节点树上设置的, 则不会阻止转换进程访问已加载文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后, 将保持其原始状态。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着, 在调用该方法后, 在转换进程之前是当前节点的节点将保留为当前节点。This means that the node, that is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 当`xsl:output`输出到(`xsl:output`被忽略) 时, 不支持元素。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (`xsl:output` is ignored). 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. > [!NOTE] > 此方法现已过时。This method is now obsolete. 属性的设置确定如何解析 XSLT `document()`函数。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法, 该方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段, 必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的, 并将其传递给方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 下面的示例对节点片段执行转换。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 该示例使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`文件作为输入, 并将以下结果输出到控制台。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例在 ASP.NET 页中执行转换。The following example performs a transformation within an ASP.NET page. XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选项将应用于整个文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换言之, 如果当前节点是在文档根节点以外的节点树上设置的, 则不会阻止转换进程访问已加载文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后, 将保持其原始状态。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着, 在调用方法后, 节点 (在转换进程之前是当前节点) 将保留当前节点。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 有关[](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)支持的`xsl:output`属性的详细信息, 请参阅 XslTransform 的输出。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. ## Examples 下面的示例将 customer 表加载到中 , 并执行 XSLT 转换, 以将客户数据提取到 HTML 表中。The following example loads a customer table into an and performs an XSLT transformation to pull the customer data into an HTML table. 该示例使用 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Northwind 数据库。The example uses the Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator/CS/dataset_trans.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator/VB/dataset_trans.vb#1)] 示例使用 `customers.xsl` 文件作为输入。The example uses the `customers.xsl` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator/XML/customers.xsl#2)]

XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选项将应用于整个文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换言之, 如果当前节点是在文档根节点以外的节点树上设置的, 则不会阻止转换进程访问已加载文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后, 将保持其原始状态。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着, 在调用方法后, 节点 (在转换进程之前是当前节点) 将保留当前节点。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 当输出`xsl:output` 到时, 不支持元素上的编码属性。The encoding attribute on an `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to a . 有关[](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)支持的`xsl:output`属性的详细信息, 请参阅 XslTransform 的输出。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported.

XSLT 样式表必须包括命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 与样式表中定义的元素匹配。`xsl:param` `args`The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选项将应用于整个文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换言之, 如果当前节点是在文档根节点以外的节点树上设置的, 则不会阻止转换进程访问已加载文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后, 将保持其原始状态。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着, 在调用该方法后, 在转换进程之前是当前节点的节点将保留为当前节点。This means that the node, that is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 当`xsl:output`输出到(`xsl:output`被忽略) 时, 不支持元素。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (`xsl:output` is ignored). 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例在执行 XSLT 转换之前加载并编辑 XML 文档。The following example loads and edits an XML document before performing an XSLT transform. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新的 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 中, 应用程序的信任级别确定了默认行为:In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior: `Fully trusted code:`使用不带用户凭据的默认值来`document()`解析函数。`Fully trusted code:` A default with no user credentials is used to resolve the `document()` function. 如果访问外部资源需要身份验证, 请使用此属性指定具有必要凭据的。If authentication is required to access the external resource, use this property to specify an with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:`属性设置为`null`, 这`document()`意味着不会解析函数。`Semi-trusted code:` The property is set to `null`, which means the `document()` function is not resolved. 由于需要完全信任来指定, 因此也不能设置此属性。Because full trust is required to specify an , this property also cannot be set. 调用 XSLT `document()`函数时, 将使用此解析程序。This resolver is used when the XSLT `document()` function is invoked. 它不用于解析`xsl:import`样式表中引用的元素和`xsl:include`元素。It is not used to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet. 若要指定要用于解析`xsl:import`的和`xsl:include`样式表中引用的元素 , 请使用重载, 该重载采用作为其参数之一。To specify an to use to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet, use the overload, which takes an as one of its arguments. > [!NOTE] > 此属性在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 中已过时。This property is obsolete in version 1.1 of the .NET Framework. 建议使用方法来指定。Specifying an using the method is the recommended practice. 在这种情况下 , 在方法完成后, 不会缓存。In this case, the is not cached after the method completes.
